messages.subject: Re: Apprenticing was: Parenting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/26/99 5:36:41 PM Pacific Daylight Time, megates@juno.com ... I m really really big on the idea of apprenticeship or mentoring.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/26/99 5:36:41 PM Pacific Daylight Time, megates@...
writes:

> And those few things could have been learned with a
> mentor, or as an apprentice.

I'm really really big on the idea of apprenticeship or mentoring.
Apprenticeship used to be big in this country too. Does anyone know the
history of why that changed? Maybe the industrial revolution? And does
anyone know of any kind of fledgling apprentice movement (I've talked to many
other people who also like the idea) or apprentice opportunities or a book on
same?

Elizabeth
